content: round 3 chain 5 single_crochet in next chain space 5 times chain 5 slip_stitch in top of 1st chain space to join round 4 chain 3 6 double_crochet ni first chain space 7 double_crochet in next chain space around join w/ a slip_stitch in top of beginning chain 3 42 double_crochet made counting beginning chain 3 as a stitch 6 groups of double_crochet each consisting of 7 double_crochet s round 5 chain 5 single_crochet in 4th double_crochet of next group chain 5 single_crochet in space between last double_crochet of group and first double_crochet of next group around join w/ a slip_stitch in first chain of first chain space 12 chain space made round 6 chain 1 in each arch work the following half_double_crochet 4dc half_double_crochet around join with a slip_stitch in chain 1 space fasten_off blue yarn 12 groups of stitches round 7 attach black yarn with a single_crochet between 2nd and 3rd double_crochet of next group work a 5dc shell between next 2 half_double_crochet single_crochet between 2nd and 3rd double_crochet of next group shell between next 2 half_double_crochet around join with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet 12 shells made round 8 chain 3 double_crochet in each st around join in top of chain 3 turn work and work the next row on the wrong side this provides shaping 72 double_crochet round 9 wrong side row chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join turn round 10 right side row chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join turn round 11 wrong side row chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join turn fasten_off black yarn join blue yarn with a slip_stitch in any stitch round 12 chain 3 fpdc in next st bpdc in next st around join with slip_stitch in top of beginning chain do not turn rounds 13 and 14 repeat round 12 stacking post stitches to form ribbing at end of round 14 fasten_off weave in all yarn ends copyright 2008 deborah l erbach burger all rights reserved 2
